hero.subtitle: The Evolution of MES has arrived.
hero.description: Nexus AI is the platform that transforms your factory floor into an intelligent operation. We don't just collect data — we deliver automated decisions, real-time visibility, and intelligence that acts for you.

problem.title: The Manufacturing Industry operates blind
problem.subtitle: While your factory produces, problems go unnoticed. Every minute of delay in identification means accumulated waste and lost opportunities.

items.title: Sampling Inspection
items.description: Traditional methods audit less than 5% of production. The rest? Pure uncertainty. Defects pass, customers complain, costs explode.

items.title: Reactive Decisions
items.description: When the problem is identified, it's already too late. 20-30 minutes to react means tons of compromised product and broken schedules.

items.title: Data without Intelligence
items.description: Your machines generate terabytes of data. But data isn't insights. Without correlation, analysis, and context, information becomes noise.

solution.title: We don't just collect data
solution.subtitle: Nexus AI connects computer vision, machine learning, and conversational AI in a unified platform that works for you 24/7.

pillars.title: Far beyond a Dashboard
pillars.subtitle: The only platform on the market that unifies 4 layers of cutting-edge technology in a single decision. Each layer empowers the other, creating an unprecedented intelligence ecosystem.

items.title: Computer Vision
items.description: Cameras and sensors that see 100% of production. Detect defects invisible to the human eye, measure millimetric variations, classify automatically.

items.title: Machine Learning
items.description: Algorithms that learn with each cycle. Identify patterns, predict failures before they happen, optimize parameters in real-time.

items.title: Conversational AI
items.description: Menthor: your assistant that responds in natural language. Ask about any metric, request analyses, receive alerts via WhatsApp.

items.title: Advanced Statistics
items.description: Automated Statistical Process Control (SPC). SPC, Cp, Cpk, control charts — all calculated and monitored in real-time.

evolution.title: Structured OEE Evolution
evolution.subtitle: A clear path of evolution, validated at each stage. Each generation adds a layer of value, building on the previous to maximize your return.

items.title: Real-Time Quality
items.description: Focus on eliminating losses and waste now. 100% automated inspection via computer vision, intelligent classification, instant alerts, and complete traceability.

items.title: Availability & Operations
items.description: Monitoring of planned and unplanned stops. MTBF, MTTR, micro-stop analysis. Correlation between availability and quality.

items.title: Performance & Scalability
items.description: Complete OEE with Performance dimension. Real vs theoretical speed analysis, bottlenecks, mix optimization. Multi-tenant architecture for scale.

items.title: Predictive Intelligence
items.description: Predictive and prescriptive Machine Learning. The machine warns before it breaks. Maintenance 4.0, digital twins, autonomous parameter optimization.

items.title: Global Platform
items.description: Autonomous optimization across multiple factories. Collective learning between plants, global benchmarking, coordinated production decisions.

features.title: What you can do with Nexus AI
features.subtitle: Features built to solve real factory floor problems, not to impress in demos.

items.title: Batch Quality Inspection

items.title: Menthor: Conversational AI

benefits.title: Transform your operation

items.title: Total Visibility

items.title: Decisions in Seconds
